attributes.action: Closure of Musuems in the North
attributes.additional_details: It is time the Government took an interest in the arts and culture. The news that there is a possibility in closing a musuem in the North like Bradford media Musuem is a disgrace and a scandal.The media musuem and its famous film festivals is vital to the local economy and puts Bradford on the map for good reasons. Shows Government does not care about North - close a musuem in London instead.We urge you to think again about cutting funds.
